document_data.caption: A [[magma drake]] (left), an [[ooze drake]] (top), a [[smoke drake]] (middle), and a water drake (bottom).
document_data.name: Water drake
document_data.mainbody: '''Water drakes''' were a species of [[elemental drake]].
document_data.Description: Water drakes, like other elemental drakes, were draconic in form and about {{SI|12|ft|long=yes}} long. They had silvery-blue scales that were more fish-like than reptilian.
document_data.Personality: Water drakes were largely indifferent to other creatures.
document_data.Abilities: Water drakes were better at swimming than flying, though they were capable of surviving on land indefinitely. Their affinity for elemental [[water]] meant that their very touch doused even magical fires.
document_data.Combat: Water drakes preferred to fight below the waves, only flying to snatch prey out of the air.

Ecology.Languages:
Water drakes were known to speak [[Aquan]] and [[Draconic language|Draconic]] in oddly pleasant burbling voices.
